channel.title: Bones on altar glitch
channel.description: So when i use bones on altar and it asks me to type in how many bones i would like to use, if i put like 100 i can go to bank and take more bones when i'm about to run out of bones so i never have to use bones on altar anymore. how would i fix this? :l

item.title: Bones on altar glitch
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:4, topic:541657”]Then you should rewrite the entire code.[/quote]Make it so if you click away, then it stops taking bones and giving EXP.

Read full topic

item.title: Bones on altar glitch

@runescape_sucks wrote:

Then you should rewrite the entire code.

item.title: Bones on altar glitch
item.dc:creator: @Cuber317 Cuber317
item.description:
@Cuber317 wrote:

runescape sucks:

A simple fix would make it if that amount entered is greater than 28, make it set to 28. A better fix would be to check if it has the amount of items entered, if not it would set it to the amount of items in the inventory via one of the methods. I believe here is a method to check how many of a certain item are in the inv, so use that.

Yeah but even if you do like 20, you can still run to bank and refill always.

Read full topic
